channel.title: Curses interface freezes me up
channel.description:
Works for about 30 seconds then results in a thread-5 error
Picture of interface (works): [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2613/screenshot700.png[/img]
[code] RS2 user client - release #317 602 Animation Amount: 13798 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 602 GFX Amount: 2617 Error: T2 - 208,65,81 - 2,3001,3621 - 52,83, Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8703) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8443) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1940) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8260) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9054) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:144) at client.run(client.java:4730) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Curses interface freezes me up

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:
